articles.title: OpenAI Is Asking Contractors to Upload Work From Past Jobs to Evaluate the Performance of AI Agents - WIRED
articles.description: To prepare AI agents for office work, the company is asking contractors to upload projects from past jobs, leaving it to them to strip out confidential and personally identifiable information.

articles.title: Amazon Has Big Hopes for Wearable AI — Starting With This $50 Gadget - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Several months after Amazon.com Inc. bought artificial intelligence hardware startup Bee, the company said it’s working to make its $50 always-listening wearable more proactive, and indicated a larger revamp is in store.

articles.title: Using AI, Mathematicians Find Hidden Glitches in Fluid Equations - Quanta Magazine
articles.description: A $1 million prize awaits anyone who can show where the math of fluid flow breaks down. With specially trained AI systems, researchers have found a slew of new candidates in simpler versions of the problem.
